about_the_game:
Overview


Mission Pack 2 gives you the second 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story, completing the first chapter of this tale. These missions bring a unique set of objectives to be completed that will push your strategic abilities beyond what has come before. With new cards, hostile units, and challenges for each Mission this pack takes Siberian Dawn and the Lore Engine to the next level.

Mission Pack 2 also adds a new Skirmish mission to Siberian Dawn using the content of this Mission Pack, and also adds the content from this DLC to "Skirmish S-0 Memory of Dawn" along with all other content owned.

If you own both Mission Pack 1 and 2 then you will also be able to play a Crisis for Chapter 1 built from the content of both these mission packs

Mission 1-4 Rat Hunt


More has been discovered about the activities of the Dawn cultists following the rescue of the captives. A rogue Overseer called a Null is helping the cultists and has built a rats nest somewhere in this area. You have to subdue any cultists you find to discover the location of this rats nest and capture the Null.

Mission 1-5 Dawn Born


From the data found in the rats nest we believe the dark plans of the Dawn cult are near completion. The location of this final activity has been found and your mission is to quickly destroy the Dawn cultists. You have to stop whatever they are doing before it can be finished.

Mission 1-6 Lockdown


IH-54 has been judged to be beyond saving from the corruption of the Dawn cultists and their dark plans.A complete lockdown has now been ordered but the innocents who are vital to the Union must be saved. Get the innocents to safety before securing your area and getting ready to seal IH-54 for its final fate.

Skirmish S-4 Shadows of Stone


Take on things of the shadows in a 30 Round Skirmish built with all content from Chapter 1 Part 2

Crisis C-2 First Dawn


Play a Crisis against the hostile forces of Chapter 1 (Requires Mission Pack 1 and 2)


Your Challenge


The fight against the Dawn in IH54 comes to a conclusion with these missions and the fate of the Union and Siberian Dawn is now in your hands. Will this be the end of the world or the start of a new dawn?

name: Siberian Dawn Mission Pack 2
short_description: Mission Pack 2 gives you 3 new full Missions, completing the first chapter of the Siberian Dawn story. Requires Mission Pack 1 to play.
